snippet: Jean-Baptiste Barrière’s penchant for mixing music, theater and literature was on display during his Composer Portraits concert on Saturday at the Miller Theater.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by French contemporary-music composer and multimedia artist Jean-Baptiste Barriere at Miller Theater as part of its Composer Portraits series.
lead_paragraph: Jean-Baptiste Barrière’s penchant for mixing music, theater and literature was on display during his Composer Portraits concert on Saturday at the Miller Theater.

headline.seo: Jean-Baptiste Barrière in Concert at Miller Theater
headline.main: Composing and Blending, an Atypical Artist Creates
headline.print_headline: Composing and Blending, an Atypical Artist Creates
